description: ANIME MANGA EXPLOSION dives into the creative secrets of Japan`s world-famous anime and manga. This episode highlights renowned anime studio Pierrot, known for countless international hits. Hear creators share untold stories behind the global phenomenon NARUTO and get an exclusive look at the production process of BLEACH: Thousand-Year Blood War. Join us and discover the unwavering passion for anime that has defined Pierrot`s 45-year legacy.
